Text.Text: [Mesmerized, as if quoting scripture from memory]And the glorious breath of our Queen, the Icedawn, swept Her enemies into the painful doom of Her servants' embrace.  [Addressing the player while motioning to the ground]*Kneel* before [Lee-z'ra]Lysara!
[Shaking her head in disappointment]The answers shall never be thy salvation... [Sigh]but ask thy questions nonetheless.

[Animated and overflowing with pride]Yea, can thee do other than marvel at its staggering magnificence?!  [Slight pause, as if waiting for a response]During our Coming Storm festival my sisters and I lead this congregation in a prayer so profound, [AWE-ril]Auril Herself blessed us with Her embrace.

[Bewildered]To our amazement, those [MAH-larr-Ite]Malarite monstrosities managed to block the [SHAYN-garn]Shaengarne River long enough for us to use its excess in this glacier's *wondrous* construction.  [Proud]A hundred hearts, beating in unison, is a bone-chilling sight.

[Proud]Great [AWE-ril]Auril quenches Her thirst on the blood of sacrifices, and *I* answer that call with swift resolve - [Concerned]Her hunger 'tis larger than I ever remember, but my place is not to question Her divinity.  [Feeling unworthy yet blessed]In reward, 'tis *She* who graces *us* with Her unwavering chill.

[Chuckling to herself while explaining]Nay, 'twas neither my kin nor I, but an icy storm, given life by a few brothers practicing a ritual atop the roof, and given purpose by our Goddess Glorious.  [Insultingly, convinced the pilot was male]Surely no *competent* helmsman would hath crashed so effortlessly.

[Agreeing]Yea, a deal with [mah-DAY]Madae, the better half of their leadership, *is* in motion - its coils unfurling as we speak.  [Explaining]For guarding this Western Pass against reinforcements to the Ten-Towns, they shall destroy [KUHL-duh-har]Kuldahar and give us its precious Heartstone Gem.

[Agreeing]Yea, a deal with [mah-DAY]Madae, the better half of their Legion of the [kai-MEE-rah]Chimera, is in motion - its coils unfurling as we speak.  [Explaining]For guarding this Western Pass against reinforcements to the Ten-Towns, they shall destroy [KUHL-duh-har]Kuldahar and give us its precious Heartstone Gem.

[Explaining]Nay, 'tis the work of [Nick-a-DEE-mas]Nickademus - arch-architect, honored guest, and former lover of my sister [o-rI-uh]Oria.  [Impressed while motioning to various parts of the room]Is she not a thing of wonder and beauty, as intricate as she is exquisite - only the celestial Frostmaiden Herself could craft its better.

[Wondering if the player met Madae]Hath thee met...? [Changing her mind, convinced the player would be dead if they had]Nay, thou surely would hath no breath upon entering her presence.  [Fondly remembering Madae as a child and pleased with her development] [mah-DAY]Madae... a most elegant creature she hath become...  [Back to the present]'tis her petition that we guard this Western Pass from militant intruders... as thyselves.

[Explaining]Madae[mah-DAY] hath promised us the destruction of Kuldahar, its defiant tree, and their sickening warmth.  [Explaining her contempt for Kuldahar]'Tis all an affront to our beloved Mother Winter and all that She embodies - ergo, 'tis an affront to Her children as well.

[Erupting with excitement at the possibilities] [KUHL-duh-har]Kuldahar's most prized possession furthermore - the fabled Heartstone Gem - would be seized and placed into *our* care.  Such a device would be invaluable in our quest to quench all fires, freeze all lands, and crush our enemies in waves of ice and cold!  [Calming down, remembering a vow made long ago]Lysan[Lee-zan] be redeemed!

[Explaining]Siblings twin art Lord [ih-ZAIR]Isair and Lady [mah-DAY]Madae, and the entire Legion of the [kai-MEE-rah]Chimera answers to them.  [Explaining further]The church 'tis no member of this legion, but wisely acknowledges its sovereignty.

[About the explain]Yea, they art... [Suddenly realizing that most of them are probably dead]*were* our brothers and sisters of the faith.  In life, they provided enough resistance for us to complete these frozen monuments, and in death, we honor their devotion.

[Excited about it, yet not quite sure of all it can do]'Tis a scrying device like no other - its power *thou* shall never see in thy lifetime... [Yawns from boredom and frustrated that she doesn't know more about it]My temper rises as my patience dwindles - hath thy interrogation reached its limit?

[Very assertive]Lysan[Lee-zan], our idol and inspiration, is why we submit to [AWE-ril]Auril - why we hath traveled here from [LUH-skin]Luskan and [GLIHS-ter]Glister - why we art what we hath become.  [Becoming angry]At her highest peak she was struck down by Easthaven mercenaries, guilty only of her beliefs!  [Calming down, remembering a vow made long ago]Lysan be avenged!

[Remembering her honorable self before turning hard and cruel]'Tis true, 'tis true, I... [Snapping from her daydream and back into reality, thinking of her former self as a different, weaker person]Nay, that *kind,* *honorable* woman died thirty years ago when [Lee-zan]Lysan was slaughtered, like a diseased goblin, in [KREH-seh-lak]Kresselack's Tomb by a band of villains in heroes' clothing.  [Calming down, remembering a vow made long ago]Lysan be delivered!
[Preaching]They art those that hath been oppressed by *thy* laws and self-righteous wrath, whose voices shall stay silent no longer.  To oppose them is to oppose life itself.
[Aware of the ruse, but trying to keep a straight face]Welcome, my loyal disciple.  How may I be of service to thee?

[Insulted that the player would think their ruse would work]Imbecile!  Did thou think this temple's high priestess would not even know her own clergy?!  [Changing temperament slightly]I do admire thy cleverness, [but infuriated at the blatant misuse of her relics]though my eyes burn from thy blasphemous stains on our frosty relics!

[Agreeing reluctantly]Thy argument cuts like sharp ice...  [But it's irrelevant nonetheless]but thy words float from me like snow in the wind.  [Explaining]What we hath wrought, in the undying name of Lady Frostkiss, is here everlasting - no death, not even *mine,* can undo *Her* works.
[Angry]And were my sisters not defending *their*selves - *their* home - *my* home?!  *Thou* art the intruder here, *not* we!

[Convinced the player is who she's been sensing]If a servant of [TAH-los]Talos thou art, then I hath sensed thy presence for some time, so forgive my face for harboring no astonishment.  [Agreeing]Yea, [AWE-ril]Auril serves Talos, and *I* serve She... [Disagreeing vehemently]but *not* thee!
[Calming down, finally aware of the trickery]Nay, thou art no [tah-LOW-shan]Talosian... thy deliverance shall be greater for thy deceit!

[Surprised and amused that the player would fall for such a trick]Foolish child thou art!  [Disappointed and confused as to how they managed to get this far]If there be room to squeeze one final lesson into thy shrunken skull before I take thy soul... *never* let thy enemies tower over thee!

[Sad, holding back the tears]Thy hand hath ripped [ka-thin]Cathin, my beloved sister-in-arms, from my body, leaving a void so deep it shall *never* be filled!  [Becoming angry]Why hast thou done this?!

[Sad, holding back the tears, speaking into the distance]Oria[o-rI-uh], thy voice is so silent... and now I am incomplete... yet thy assassins cower in judgment below me...  [To the party, becoming angry]Hast thou *any* justification for thy actions?!

[Devastated]I am empty - a winter without chill.  [At the breaking point]Another glacier shall be formed from my tears alone.  [To the player, becoming increasing furious]What word, army, or *god* could prevent me from slaying thee?!

[Mesmerized, as if quoting scripture from memory]And [Lee-z'ra]Lysara, lifted into the heavens by the glorious might of her Snow Queen, came crashing down upon their enemies within furious clouds of fiery ice and frozen fear!

[Mesmerized, as if quoting scripture from memory]Though I walk into the flames of the Nine Hells, I shall not waver or yield, for I *know* the lands of [Fay-ROON]Faerun shall be consumed by her majesty's icy breath, and I *shall* be delivered.  [AWE-ril]Auril, I offer myself to Thee to unleash Thy vengeance and fury!

[Weak and on death's door]Cathin...?![ka-THIN]  [o-rI-uh]Oria...?!  Hast thou abandoned me?  [Looking to the heavens] [AWE-ril]Auril... sweet, loving Auril - I hath failed Thee, yet still Thee beckons me... shelters me... delivers me...

[Squinting at a shadowy figure approaching in the distance]What?  Shadow, who art thou?!  Is that thee? [Realizing the figure is Lysan, spirits lifting]Oh, blessed be!  Take my hand, icepriestess... take my hand.  [Lee-zan]Lysan... be... received.
First, I've a question.
In the name of Talos, master of Auril, I hereby take control of this temple and its resources.  Stand aside!
In the name of Talos, master of Auril, I hereby take control of this temple and its resources.  Stand aside!
Did you create this glacier?
Did you create this temple?
What's happening here?
What have you done to this area to make the air colder and the ice unbreakable?
Did you cause my airship to crash?
Are you working with the Legion of the Chimera?
Are you working with Isair and Madae?
I detect a kind woman hiding behind that armored skin.  What's made you so wicked?
Go on.
Go on.
Why did you create this glacier?
Did you create this temple?
What's happening here?
What have you done to this area to make the air colder and the ice unbreakable?
Did you cause my airship to crash?
Are you working with the Legion of the Chimera?
Are you working with Isair and Madae?
I detect a kind woman hiding behind that armored skin.  What's made you so wicked?
I can't allow you to continue sacrificing innocent people to your evil goddess.  This ends now!
I've heard enough!  It's time for you to die!
Yes, I'll kneel before you.

Did you create this temple?
Did you cause my airship to crash?

Are you working with Isair and Madae?

So the people of Andora were working for you?

I've questions to ask.

Are you working with Isair and Madae?
I detect a kind woman hiding behind that armored skin.  What's made you so wicked?
High Priestess, I've misplaced my prison key.  Where I can find another?
High Priestess, we've caught more soldiers trying to enter the temple.  Where shall I take their equipment?
High Priestess, part of the glacier is melting.  What can I do to prevent that?
High Priestess, perhaps you should get some rest.  I can perform your duties if you'd like.
I'm fine.  Farewell.
But it is you who intrude upon the Western Pass.
Sometimes death is unavoidable.
Then you'll at least answer my questions.
No, I misspoke.  Can I ask a question?
Let's see about that!
I-
I was only defending myself.
I was only defending myself.
I was only defending myself.

TriggersResponse:
!Kit(Protagonist,CLERIC_TALOS)
CheckStatGT(Protagonist, 12, INT)
CheckStatGT(Protagonist, 12, WIS)
!ClassEx(Protagonist,PALADIN)
Or(2)
!ClassEx(Protagonist,CLERIC)
Alignment(Protagonist,CHAOTIC_EVIL)
CheckSkillGT(Protagonist,0,Bluff)
